segments.text: I'm just watching the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that one plate, polishing it with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her concentration is truly remarkable, almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, it's also incredibly alarming to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing right in front of her, a continuous sheet of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly unaware of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels almost impossible that she hasn't felt the cold water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, not a flicker of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer waste of water is bothersome, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her own little world, oblivious to the impending mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of distraction is truly something else.
segments.speaker: PAR
